Embrace Mortal
Make one of your herd a Kindred, completely drain of it's blood and then fed it by yours.
Affinity to Correspondence Sphere
Correspondence magic allows powers such as teleportation, seeing into distant areas, levitation and flying.
Affinity to Entropy Sphere
Entropy concerns itself mainly with the study of order, chaos, luck and destiny.
Affinity to Forces Sphere
Forces is the Sphere of energetic Patterns, among them heat, light, vibration, radiation and gravity.
Affinity to Life Sphere
Life governs those Patterns that grow, evolve and eventually change.
Affinity to Matter Sphere
Matter is the Pattern Sphere that purviews all inorganic Patterns.
Affinity to Mind Sphere
Mind Sphere affects how a being sees the world around it.
Affinity to Prime Sphere
Prime is the Sphere of magic that governs the raw energy of reality.
Affinity to Spirit Sphere
Spirit is a homogeneous whole, a sort of conceptual energy given a special form that can mirror or mimic the more mundane Patterns of elements.
Affinity to Time Sphere
Time is the Sphere of magic that governs the time flow.
